skills.title: Adrenaline Rush
skills.desc: Perform a perfectly-timed evade just as a monster attacks for a temporary attack boost

skills.title: Affinity Sliding
skills.desc: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time

skills.title: Agitator
skills.desc: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged

skills.title: Ammo Up
skills.desc: Increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)
skills.Level1: Expands clip size for some ammo types
skills.Level2: Expands clip size for many ammo types
skills.Level3: Expands clip size for most ammo types

skills.title: Artillery
skills.desc: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo
skills.Level1: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%
skills.Level2: Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%
skills.Level3: Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%

skills.title: Attack Boost
skills.desc: Increases attack power

skills.title: Ballistics
skills.desc: Shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power

skills.title: Berserk
skills.desc: Switch to the Blue Swap Scroll and all vitality will change to red gauge and start decreasing. As long as you have red you cannot faint
skills.Level2: Slows the speed at which your red gauge depletes when using the Blue Swap Scroll

skills.title: Bladescale Hone
skills.desc: Dodge rolling to evade an attack with your weapon drawn will recover sharpness, refill bowgun ammo, or give Close-range Coatings a temporary boost

skills.title: Blast Attack
skills.desc: Increases blast element attack power

skills.title: Blast Resistance
skills.desc: Grants protection against blastblight
skills.Level1: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage
skills.Level2: Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage

skills.title: Blight Resistance
skills.desc: Grants protection against all elemental blights
skills.Level1: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%
skills.Level2: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%

skills.title: Blood Rite
skills.desc: A proportion of damage dealt is converted to health when striking a broken monster part
skills.Level2: Increase the amount of health you recover
skills.Level3: Further increases the amount of health you recover

skills.title: Bloodlust
skills.desc: The effects of the Frenzy virus change. Health is gradually reduced, but you gain a variety of effects. Frenzy virus occurs regularly when in combat
skills.Level1: While infected, attack & evasion increase & stamina use reduced
skills.Level2: While infected, further boost to effects received. Upon recovery, further increase to affinity
skills.Level3: While infected, further boost to effects received. Upon recovery, further increases duration of increased affinity

skills.title: Bludgeoner
skills.desc: Increases attack power when your weapon sharpness is low
skills.Level1: +5% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is yellow or lower
skills.Level2: +10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is yellow or lower
skills.Level3: +10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is green or lower

skills.title: Bombardier
skills.desc: Increases the damage of explosive items

skills.title: Botanist
skills.desc: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather
skills.Level1: One extra consumable herb item per gather
skills.Level2: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather
skills.Level3: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather
skills.Level4: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect, or mushroom item per gather

skills.title: Bow Charge Plus
skills.desc: Increases max bow charge level by one

skills.title: Bubbly Dance
skills.desc: Reduces bubbleblight and grants increased evasion when afflicted
skills.Level1: Reduces the effects of major bubbleblight
skills.Level2: Reduces major bubbleblight to minor bubbleblight and increases evasiveness while afflicted
skills.Level3: Also inflicts bubbleblight when performing consecutive evasive movement

skills.title: Buildup Boost
skills.desc: Increases attack power when you land attacks that build poison, paralysis, sleep, blast, or exhaust. (Exhaust - ammo/phials/coatings only)
skills.Level1: While active, increases attack power by 10%
skills.Level2: While active, increases attack power by 15%
skills.Level3: While active, increases attack power by 20%

skills.title: Burst
skills.desc: Continuously landing hits gradually increases attack and elemental attack. (The amount of increase depends on the weapon.)
skills.Level1: Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for an extra stat boost
skills.Level2: Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for an even bigger stat boost
skills.Level3: Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for a huge stat boost

skills.title: Capture Master
skills.desc: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

skills.title: Carving Master
skills.desc: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest)

skills.title: Carving Pro
skills.desc: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.

skills.title: Chameleos Blessing
skills.desc: Gain the power of the elder dragon Chameleos
skills.Level1: Sometimes increases the effects of Spiribirds
skills.Level2: Also negates minor and major wind pressure
skills.Level3: Also extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters

skills.title: Charge Master
skills.desc: When a charged attack hits a monster, the element and status buildup of the charged attack increases
skills.Level1: When active, grants a slight increase to elemental damage and status buildup
skills.Level2: When active, grants an increase to elemental damage and status buildup
skills.Level3: When active, grants a large increase to elemental damage and status buildup

skills.title: Coalescence
skills.desc: Temporarily enhances attacks after recovering from blights or abnormal status
skills.Level1: While active, attack +12, element attack power +2, and status buildup +5%
skills.Level2: While active, attack +15, element attack power +3, and status buildup +10%
skills.Level3: While active, attack +18, element attack power +4, and status buildup +20%

skills.title: Constitution
skills.desc: Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions

skills.title: Counterstrike
skills.desc: Temporarily increases attack power after being thrown off

skills.title: Critical Boost
skills.desc: Increases the damage of critical hits
skills.Level1: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 30%
skills.Level2: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 35%
skills.Level3: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%

skills.title: Critical Draw
skills.desc: Increases affinity for a short time after performing a draw attack. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

skills.title: Critical Element
skills.desc: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits

skills.title: Critical Eye
skills.desc: Increases affinity

skills.title: Defense Boost
skills.desc: Increases defense. Resistances will also improve as the level increases

skills.title: Defiance
skills.desc: Increases defense when large monsters become enraged
skills.Level1: While active, nullifles weak roars, wind pressure, and tremors.
skills.Level2: While active, nullifles weak roars, wind pressure, and tremors. Reduces all strong ones, def +5
skills.Level3: While active, nullifles weak and strong roars, wind pressure, and tremors, def +10
skills.Level4: While active, nullifles weak and strong roars, wind, and tremors, reduces powerful roars & d.wind, def +20
skills.Level5: While active, nullifles weak, strong and powerful  roars, wind & dragon wind, and tremors, del +30

skills.title: Dereliction
skills.desc: Qurio will drain health, but also bolster your attacks. Multiple Qurio further bolster attacks and let you recover health when performing a Switch Skill Swap
skills.Level1: Using Red Scroll: Increased elemental and status values. Using Blue Scroll: Increased attack and stun potency
skills.Level2: Bolsters your attacks depending on which Swap Scroll is used
skills.Level3: Further bolsters your attacks depending on which Swap Scroll is used.

skills.title: Diversion
skills.desc: Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster

skills.title: Divine Blessing
skills.desc: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take
skills.Level1: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%
skills.Level2: While active, reduces damage taken by 30%
skills.Level3: While active, reduces damage taken by 50%

skills.title: Dragon Attack
skills.desc: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

skills.title: Dragon Conversion
skills.desc: When using the Red Swap Scroll, all elemental resistance is set to 0 and converted into elemental attack. The Blue Swap Scroll raises elemental resistance.
skills.Level2: All elemental resistances +5. When using the Blue Swap Scroll, resistance buildup increases when continuously attacking
skills.Level3: All elemental resistances + 10. When using the Red Swap Scroll, the conversion rate for elemental attacks increases

skills.title: Dragon Resistance
skills.desc: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels

skills.title: Dragonheart
skills.desc: Draconic energy fills you after losing a certain amount of health. Weapons lose all non-dragon effects
skills.Level1: When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 30
skills.Level2: When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50
skills.Level3: When your health is at 70% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50
skills.Level4: Contract dragonblight when at 70% health or less. Sets elemental resistances to 50 and gain 5% attack power
skills.Level5: Contract dragonblight when at 80% health or less. Sets elemental resistances to 50 and gain 10% attack power

skills.title: Earplugs
skills.desc: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.

skills.title: Element Exploit
skills.desc: Increase elemental damage when attacking body parts upon which the element is highly effective

skills.title: Embolden
skills.desc: When targeted by a monster, that monster becomes more likely to become enraged but your own defense is increased

skills.title: Evade Extender
skills.desc: Increases evade distance

skills.title: Evade Window
skills.desc: Extends the invulnerability period when evading

skills.title: Fire Attack
skills.desc: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

skills.title: Fire Resistance
skills.desc: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels

skills.title: Flinch Free
skills.desc: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage

skills.title: Focus
skills.desc: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks

skills.title: Foray
skills.desc: Increases attack power and affinity when attacking a large monster affected by poison, paralysis or an elemental blight

skills.title: Fortify
skills.desc: Increases tour attack and defense when you fall in battle. (Disabled for some quests. Can stack twice.)

skills.title: Free Meal
skills.desc: Gives you  a predetermined chance of consuming food or drink item for free

skills.title: Frostcraft
skills.desc: An aura of frost builds when your weapon is sheathed, raising attack. The effect decreases with each melee hit or shot/arrow fired

skills.title: Furious
skills.desc: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time

skills.title: Geologist
skills.desc: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point

skills.title: Good Luck
skills.desc: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest)

skills.title: Grinder (S)
skills.desc: When recovering sharpness, grants a boost to sharpness properties based on the number of levels recovered

skills.title: Guard
skills.desc: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding

skills.title: Guard Up
skills.desc: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks

skills.title: Guts
skills.desc: Prevents fainting one time only when damage taken exceeds a certain amount of your remaining health

skills.title: Handicraft
skills.desc: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum

skills.title: Hellfire Cloak
skills.desc: Grants hellfire resistance and confers explosive hellfire power to your attacks

skills.title: Heroics
skills.desc: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower

skills.title: Horn Maestro
skills.desc: Increases overall performance speed and shockwave damage

skills.title: Hunger Resistance
skills.desc: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time

skills.title: Ice Attack
skills.desc: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

skills.title: Ice Resistance
skills.desc: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels

skills.title: Intrepid Heart
skills.desc: After filling the gauge by continuously landing attacks, negates damage reactions and reduces damage taken from a single attack that would knock you back

skills.title: Item Prolonger
skills.desc: Extends the duration of some item effects

skills.title: Jump Master
skills.desc: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump

skills.title: Kushala Blessing
skills.desc: Gain the power of the elder dragon Kushala Daora

skills.title: Latent Power
skills.desc: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met

skills.title: Leap of Faith
skills.desc: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance

skills.title: Load Shells
skills.desc: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity

skills.title: Mail of Hellfire
skills.desc: Decreases defense but increases attack. Exact changes to stats depends on Switch Skill Swap Scroll that is being used

skills.title: Marathon Runner
skills.desc: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

skills.title: Master Mounter
skills.desc: Improves your Wyvern Riding skills

skills.title: Master's Touch
skills.desc: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits

skills.title: Maximum Might
skills.desc: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time

skills.title: Mind's Eye
skills.desc: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets

skills.title: Muck Resistance
skills.desc: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck or deep snow

skills.title: Mushroomancer
skills.desc: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects

skills.title: Normal/Rapid Up
skills.desc: Increases the attack power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows

skills.title: Offensive Guard
skills.desc: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard

skills.title: Paralysis Attack
skills.desc: Increases paralysis element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

skills.title: Paralysis Resistance
skills.desc: Reduces the duration of paralysis

skills.title: Partbreaker
skills.desc: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters

skills.title: Peak Performance
skills.desc: Increases attack when your health is full

skills.title: Pierce Up
skills.desc: Increases the attack power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows

skills.title: Poison Attack
skills.desc: Increases poison element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

skills.title: Poison Resistance
skills.desc: Reduces damage while poisoned.

skills.title: Powder Mantle
skills.desc: Continuously attacking a large monster will cause powder to form around you. The color and effects of the powder will change over time

skills.title: Power Prolonger
skills.desc: Long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades stay powered up longer

skills.title: Protective Polish
skills.desc: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening

skills.title: Punishing Draw
skills.desc: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)

skills.title: Quick Breath
skills.desc: You can remove some statuses or slow their effects by performing a Switch Skill Swap. Health recovers when a status is removed

skills.title: Quick Sheath
skills.desc: Speeds up weapon sheathing

skills.title: Rapid Fire Up
skills.desc: Improves light bowgun rapid fire

skills.title: Rapid Morph
skills.desc: Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades

skills.title: Razor Sharp
skills.desc: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness

skills.title: Recoil Down
skills.desc: Reduces recoil while firing bowgun ammo

skills.title: Recovery Speed
skills.desc: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge)

skills.title: Recovery Up
skills.desc: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health

skills.title: Redirection
skills.desc: Perform a perfectly-timed Switch Skill Swap just as a monster attacks to reduce the damage and negate damage reactions

skills.title: Reload Speed
skills.desc: Increases bowgun reloading and bow coating loading speed

skills.title: Resentment
skills.desc: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge)

skills.title: Resuscitate
skills.desc: Increases attack power when you are suffering from an abnormal status

skills.title: Sleep Attack
skills.desc: Increases sleep element attack power. (Elemental power has a maximum limit.)

skills.title: Sleep Resistance
skills.desc: Reduces the duration of sleep

skills.title: Slugger
skills.desc: Makes it easier to stun monsters

skills.title: Sneak Attack
skills.desc: Increases damage to large monsters when attacks hit them from behind

skills.title: Spare Shot
skills.desc: Bow and bowgun shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo

skills.title: Special Ammo Boost
skills.desc: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer

skills.title: Speed Eating
skills.desc: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed

skills.title: Speed Sharpening
skills.desc: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone

skills.title: Spiribird's Call
skills.desc: Receive the effects of a random Spiribird at fixed intervals. (Certain quests only)

skills.title: Spread Up
skills.desc: Increases the attack power of Spread Ammo and Spread-type arrows

skills.title: Stamina Surge
skills.desc: Speeds up Stamina recovery

skills.title: Stamina Thief
skills.desc: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters

skills.title: Status Trigger
skills.desc: Perform a perfectly-timed evade just as a monster attacks to trigger abnormal status buildup on hit

skills.title: Steadiness
skills.desc: Suppresses the deviation of bowgun shots

skills.title: Stormsoul
skills.desc: Strengthens thunder and dragon power and improves skills of the same elements

skills.title: Strife
skills.desc: Increases elemental attack and affinity in proportion to the length of your red health gauge

skills.title: Stun Resistance
skills.desc: Reduces stun duration

skills.title: Teostra Blessing
skills.desc: Gain the power of the elder dragon Teostra

skills.title: Thunder Alignment
skills.desc: Gain the power of the elder dragon Thunder Serpent Narwa

skills.title: Thunder Attack
skills.desc: Increases thunder elemental attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

skills.title: Thunder Resistance
skills.desc: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels

skills.title: Tremor Resistance
skills.desc: Grants protection against ground tremors

skills.title: Tune-Up
skills.desc: Increases the stats of custom mods attached to bowguns

skills.title: Wall Runner
skills.desc: Reduces stamina consumption when running on walls

skills.title: Wall-Runner (Boost)
skills.desc: Wirebug Gauge recovers faster while wall running

skills.title: Water Attack
skills.desc: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

skills.title: Water Resistance
skills.desc: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels

skills.title: Weakness Exploit
skills.desc: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster's weak spot
skills.Level1: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity
skills.level2: Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity
skills.level3: Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity

skills.title: Wide-Range
skills.desc: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies

skills.title: Wind Alignment
skills.desc: Gain the power of the elder dragon Wind Serpent Ibushi

skills.title: Wind Mantle
skills.desc: Using Silkbind attacks boosts Wirebug Gauge recovery. Landing continuous attacks increases the effect. Wears off when you sheathe your weapon

skills.title: Windproof
skills.desc: Grants protection against wind pressure

skills.title: Wirebug Whisperer
skills.desc: Improves your handling of Wirebugs
